Class MapReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thedomination.utilities.MapReader

  • public class MapReader
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class MapReader initializes the ArrayList continentModels of ContinentModel type, ArrayList countryModels of CountryModel type.
    Author:
    Pritam Kumar
